plot: When Alex decides to let his hair grow, his friends Marco and Felipe started to make jokes on him and when they go to a night club, his hair makes miracles to his social life.
title: Nossa, que cabelo bonito!
plot_es: When Alex decides to let his hair grow, his friends Marco and Felipe started to make jokes on him and when they go to a night club, his hair makes miracles to his social life.
plot_en: When Alex decides to let his hair grow, his friends Marco and Felipe started to make jokes on him and when they go to a night club, his hair makes miracles to his social life.
